alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued October 27 at 3:40AM HST until October 31 at 8:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...MINOR COASTAL FLOODING DURING HIGH TIDE FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING NEAR KAUAI... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Isolated minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Vulnerable low-lying coastal roadways, docks, boat ramps, marina parking lots, and other coastal infrastructure for Kauai. * WHEN...Around 2 am HST from Saturday through Tuesday during the early morning peak high tide cycle. * IMPACTS...Flooding of beaches that are normally dry, minor coastal erosion, and saltwater inundation. Submit your coastal flooding photos to the University of Hawaii Sea Grant College Program`s Hawaii and Pacific Islands King Tides Project at: PacificIslandsKingTides.org
info.instruction: Avoid driving through flooded roadways. If you are forced to drive through salt water, be sure to rinse your vehicle with fresh water. Move electronics, vehicles or other valuables to higher ground. Monitor vessels to ensure mooring lines don`t get too tight and watchout for overwash around boat ramps. Secure canoes or other watercraft stowed on beaches.

area.areaDesc: Kauai East; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest
